official_title: A concurrent resolution regarding the Greece-Turkey situation and supporting the maintenance of the seven-to-ten ratio in United States military assistance for Greece and Turkey.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the present ratio of U.S. military assistance to Greece and Turkey should be maintained.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution regarding the Greece-Turkey situation and supporting the maintenance of the seven-to-ten ratio in United States military assistance for Greece and Turkey.
